Useful list of common robots.txt errors:

http://www.searchengineworld.com/misc/robots_txt_crawl.htm

There's also an automatic syntax checker. Upon feeding it our:

    http://crawl08.archive.org/robots.txt

...it pointed out both the duplicate "*" directives, and the
fact that it is recommended that "User-agent" be capitalized
exactly as "User-agent" (no capital 'A'), because some 
"challenged" robots may not properly be case-insensitive.

- Gordon
